May 12 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:

  • AVEVA GROUP PLC - SMALLER RELATED PARTY TRANSACTION

  • AVEVA-ON 11 MAY, ENTERED DEAL TO SELL ACQUIS SOFTWARE, TERMIS SOFTWARE & WATER LOSS MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE BUSINESSES TO SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC FOR £2.6 MILLION
